H0.text: Rings are the patterns in trees that can be used to determine its age.

H1.text: Bark ridges are patterns in trees that can be used to determine a tree's age.

H2.text: Colors are patterns in trees that can be used to determine the tree's age.

H3.text: Veins are patterns in trees that can be used to determine the tree's age.

A4.text: Dendrochronology is the scientific method of dating tree rings to the exact year they were formed in a tree.
